WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 20 JAN BY
   M/V BGP CHALLENGER TOWING 12000 METER LONG CABLE
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   28-00S 043-08W, 28-04S 043-12W,
   28-08S 043-16W, 28-06S 043-29W,
   28-02S 043-44W, 27-58S 044-00W,
   26-56S 045-25W, 26-52S 045-21W,
   26-48S 045-17W, 26-43S 045-14W,
   26-39S 045-10W, 26-35S 045-06W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 72/18.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 21 JAN 18.
